card_info.card_name: Diners Club Black Metal Edition Credit Card

rewards.rewardDescription: Complimentary Annual Memberships of Club Marriott, Amazon Prime & Swiggy One on achieving net retail spends of Rs 1,50,000 within 90 days of card issuance.
Get 10,000 reward points upon spending Rs. 4,00,000 or more in a calendar quarter

2X Reward Points i.e. 10 Reward points per Rs. 150 spend at standalone restaurants during weekend â€“ Saturday and Sunday. 5 Reward points will be credited on the same day as the settlement/posting date of the eligible transaction. Additional 5 Reward Points will be credited within 2 days of settlement/posting date of the transaction.
